text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes If by great ratings you mean that 1) 3 million more people voted for Hillary Clinton than you, 2) millions of people are tuning in daily to watch your shitshow coronavirus briefings, and 3) billions of people globally are laughing at you, then yes, you have great rating.
